trans-unit.target: AbortPolicy

trans-unit.source: Aborts the attempt to cache the response. If an IOException is encountered while reading the response or writing to the cache, the current cache store operation will be abandoned.
trans-unit.target: 放弃缓存响应的尝试。如果在读取响应或写入缓存时遇到IOException,则会放弃当前的缓存存储操作。

trans-unit.target: 读写单个字符的绝对和相对的 get 和 put 方法；

trans-unit.target: 读取和写入单个浮点数的绝对和相对的 get 和 put 方法；

trans-unit.target: 读取和写入单个int的绝对和相对 get 和 put 方法；

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for reference objects.
trans-unit.target: 引用对象的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for reference objects. This class defines the operations common to all reference objects. Because reference objects are implemented in close cooperation with the garbage collector, this class may not be subclassed directly.
trans-unit.target: 引用对象的抽象基类。该类定义了所有引用对象的共同操作。因为参考对象是在与垃圾回收器的密切合作下实现的,所以这个类不能直接被子类化。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for tasks that run within a ForkJoinPool.
trans-unit.target: 在 ForkJoinPool 中运行的任务的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for tasks that run within a ForkJoinPool. A ForkJoinTask is a thread-like entity that is much lighter weight than a normal thread. Huge numbers of tasks and subtasks may be hosted by a small number of actual threads in a ForkJoinPool, at the price of some usage limitations.
trans-unit.target: 在 ForkJoinPool 中运行的任务的抽象基类。一个 ForkJoinTask 是比正常的线程重量轻得多螺纹状的实体。大量的任务和子任务可能由ForkJoinPool中的少量实际线程托管，但以某些使用限制为代价。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: X.509证书的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for X.509 certificates. This provides a standard way to access all the attributes of an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509证书的抽象类。它提供了一个标准的方式来访问一个X.509证书的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for X.509 v1 certificates.
trans-unit.target: X.509 v1证书的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for X.509 v1 certificates. This provides a standard way to access all the version 1 attributes of an X.509 certificate. Attributes that are specific to X.509 v2 or v3 are not available through this interface. Future API evolution will provide full access to complete X.509 v3 attributes.
trans-unit.target: X.509 v1 证书的抽象类。它提供了一个标准的方式来访问 X.509 证书的所有版本 1 属性。特定于 X.509 v2 或 v3 的属性不能通过这个接口获得。未来的 API 演进将提供完整的 X.509 v3 属性的访问。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for a revoked certificate in a CRL (Certificate Revocation List).
trans-unit.target: CRL(证书废止列表)中废止证书的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for a revoked certificate in a CRL (Certificate Revocation List). The ASN.1 definition for revokedCertificates is:
trans-unit.target: CRL（证书吊销列表）中已吊销证书的抽象类。revokedCertificates的ASN.1定义是：

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for an X.509 Certificate Revocation List (CRL).
trans-unit.target: X.509证书撤销列表(CRL)的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for an X.509 Certificate Revocation List (CRL). A CRL is a time-stamped list identifying revoked certificates. It is signed by a Certificate Authority (CA) and made freely available in a public repository.
trans-unit.target: X.509证书撤销列表(CRL)的抽象类。CRL是一个有时间标记的列表,用于识别被撤销的证书,它由证书颁发机构(CA)签署,并在公共存储库中免费提供。它由证书颁发机构(CA)签署,并在公共存储库中免费提供。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for managing a variety of identity certificates.
trans-unit.target: 用于管理各种身份证书的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for managing a variety of identity certificates. An identity certificate is a binding of a principal to a public key which is vouched for by another principal. (A principal represents an entity such as an individual user, a group, or a corporation.)
trans-unit.target: 用于管理各种身份证书的抽象类。身份证书是一个委托人与另一个委托人保证的公开密钥的绑定。(一个委托人代表一个实体,如个人用户、团体或公司。)

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for managing a variety of identity certificates. An identity certificate is a guarantee by a principal that a public key is that of another principal. (A principal represents an entity such as an individual user, a group, or a corporation.)
trans-unit.target: 用于管理各种身份证书的抽象类。身份证书是由一个委托人保证一个公钥是另一个委托人的。(一个委托人代表一个实体,如个人用户、团体或公司。)

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for reading character streams.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取字符流的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for reading character streams. The only methods that a subclass must implement are read(char[], int, int) and close(). Most subclasses, however, will override some of the methods defined here in order to provide higher efficiency, additional functionality, or both.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取字符流的抽象类。子类必须实现的唯一方法是read(char[],int,int)和close()。然而,大多数子类会重写这里定义的一些方法,以提供更高的效率、额外的功能,或者两者兼而有之。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for reading filtered character streams.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取过滤后的字符流的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for reading filtered character streams. The abstract class FilterReader itself provides default methods that pass all requests to the contained stream. Subclasses of FilterReader should override some of these methods and may also provide additional methods and fields.
trans-unit.target: 读取过滤的字符流的抽象类。抽象类 FilterReader 本身提供了默认方法，该方法将所有请求传递到所包含的流。 FilterReader 的子类应覆盖其中的某些方法，并且还可以提供其他方法和字段。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for representing access to a system resource.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示对系统资源访问的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for representing access to a system resource. All permissions have a name (whose interpretation depends on the subclass), as well as abstract functions for defining the semantics of the particular Permission subclass.
trans-unit.target: 代表对系统资源访问的抽象类。所有权限都有一个名称(其解释取决于子类),以及用于定义特定权限子类语义的抽象函数。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for writing filtered character streams.
trans-unit.target: 用于编写过滤字符流的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for writing filtered character streams. The abstract class FilterWriter itself provides default methods that pass all requests to the contained stream. Subclasses of FilterWriter should override some of these methods and may also provide additional methods and fields.
trans-unit.target: 用于编写过滤的字符流的抽象类。抽象类 FilterWriter 本身提供了默认方法，该方法将所有请求传递到所包含的流。 FilterWriter 的子类应覆盖其中的某些方法，并且还可以提供其他方法和字段。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for writing to character streams.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入字符流的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class for writing to character streams. The only methods that a subclass must implement are write(char[], int, int), flush(), and close(). Most subclasses, however, will override some of the methods defined here in order to provide higher efficiency, additional functionality, or both.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入字符流的抽象类。一个子类必须实现的唯一方法是write(char[],int,int),flush()和close()。然而,大多数子类会重写这里定义的一些方法,以便提供更高的效率、额外的功能,或者两者兼而有之。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class representing a collection of Permission objects.
trans-unit.target: 代表Permission对象集合的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract class that provides for extension of the X509KeyManager interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供 X509KeyManager 接口扩展的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Abstract datagram and multicast socket implementation base class.
trans-unit.target: 抽象的数据报和组播套接字实现基类。
